product_name: The Runner's World Big Book of Marathon and Half-Marathon Training
long_description: Packed full of winning strategies and useful training tools,. Authors: Jennifer Van Allen, Bart Yasso, Amby Burfoot and Pamela Nisevich Bede. Softcover; 290 pages; black-and-white photographs. Rodale Press, Inc.; copyright 2012. . Includes more than 24 workouts to build speed and endurance, 3-day eating plans for weight loss, a carb loading plan and tips on how to shave minutes off your personal best. Offers secrets for relieving side stitches and knee pain, as well as tips on stretching and staying healthy. Measures 9 x 7.5 in.
short_description: Packed full of winning strategies and useful training tools, The Runner's World Big Book of Marathon and Half-Marathon Training prepares you for the big day with step-by-step advice.
